title: Spanish national among motor accident fatalities in past 24 hours
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Several road accidents had taken place during the past 24 hours in the country, resulting in 6 fatalities.
Six people, including a Spanish National, died in these road accidents.
Police said that two persons were dead when a motorcycle collided with a telephone pole in Akkaraipattu.
Three others died in accidents in Lunugamwehera, Seeduwa, and Ahangama.
A 35-year-old Spanish national died in a motorcycle accident in Ahangama as well.
